name: NotaStrategy
description: NotaStrategy is a Bitcoin Treasury Meme Coin listed on both Stacks and Solana. We seek to educate and promote the benefits of owning Bitcoin and using Bitcoin Defi by mimicking Bitcoin Treasury Companies. We also entertain and engage our community members through memes and giveaway competitions . We were first listed on Stacks and we aim to promote Stacks as the leading Bitcoin L2 for BTC DEFi.
